mapper.select: select sc_no , mem_name as sc_writer , sc_title , sc_content , sc_type , sc_start , sc_end , allday , s.status from schedule s join member m on (s.sc_writer = m.mem_no) where s.status = 'Y' and sc_type like '%' || #{scType} || '%' and sc_writer = #{memNo}
